definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Electrical conductors are used to conduct electric current, as in the metal wires of an electric circuit.
sentences.chinese: 電導體用來導電，例如一個電路中的金屬線。

sentences.english: He found next to the conductor in the power of small needle deflection in an instant.
sentences.chinese: 他發現了在通電導體旁邊的小磁針在瞬間偏轉。

sentences.english: An electrical conductor looks the same whether it is live or dead.
sentences.chinese: 電導體不管是否帶電，表面看來都是一樣的。
